## Why Data Management?

  _~ Aleata Hubbard Cheuoua_ [@hubbard_data_2017]

## Establishing a Research Workflow
:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
::: {.fragment .fade-in}
**Increases:**  :arrow_up: 

- Study replication
- Cumulative knowledge development
- Teamwork
- Ease of revision to a project/study
- Higher impact research
:::
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
::: {.fragment .fade-in}
**Reduces:**  :arrow_down:

- Effort duplication
- Frustration
- Communication Issues
:::
:::
